text: Frederick Bernard Rooney, Jr. (November 6, 1925 - December 23, 2019) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Pennsylvania from 1963 until 1979. Rooney died at his home in Washington D.C. on December 23, 2019 at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly
title: Fred B. Rooney
